bug.summary: [BUG] staging branch cannot run pytest unless it's on the root directory
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
staging branch cannot run pytest unless it's on the root directory. After removing the init.py in the root directory, the tests can run from any directory within the repo. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
just pick any unittest to run, for example pytest test_luis_model_loading.py in tests/unit/app_tests <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
The test should run without error <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
